page.title: 09Trade
page.content: In our block there are four shops, two genral shops and two post offices.The two Ashton shops sell a wide range of food including meat,fish(fresh and frozen),cheese,bread,veg.Broomhouse stores also sells paints,calor gas and beer and wine.Meadow stores is mainly a grocery store.The two post offices sell news papers and stationary,baby clothes and fancy goods.The Manley P.O. is also a genral store.Most villagers travel to Chester for their major shopping visiting two or three large super-markets.Some people go to Frodsham.Most families go once a week and on average spend about Â£30.Many families go to super-markets together but mothers usuaely decide what is bought.There are two mobile shops visiting Ashton and they sell fish and other meat. All the Ashton shops sell a wide range of sweets.
